languages.text: "Если же желаете узреть более изысканное развлечение, то узрите, как низвергнутый дракон Опустошительной бури бьется за жизнь против великолепных чемпионов арены, Кровавых прозелитов!"
"If you're looking for more refined entertainment, watch the ousted Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"
languages.original_text: "Если же желаете узреть более изысканное развлечение, то узрите, как низвергнутый дракон Опустошительной бури бьется за жизнь против великолепных чемпионов арены, Кровавых прозелитов!"

traits.locale_text: "If you're looking for a more refined entertainment, then watch the cast down dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"
"If you're looking for a more refined entertainment, watch the cast down Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"
"If you're looking for a more refined entertainment, watch the cast down Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"
"If you're looking for more refined entertainment, watch the ousted Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"
"If you're looking for more refined entertainment, watch the ousted Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"

languages.text: « Si vous cherchez un divertissement plus raffiné, venez assister au combat entre le dracon disgracié de la Tempête ravageuse et les grands champions de l'arène, les Prosélytes sanglants ! »
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for more refined entertainment, watch the ousted Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous cherchez un divertissement plus raffiné, venez assister au combat entre le dracon déchu de la Tempête ravageuse et les grands champions de l'arène, les Prosélytes Entachés de sang ! »

languages.text: “如果各位打算欣赏更加精致的娱乐活动，就来好好欣赏这场美妙的决斗吧！决斗双方是狂风阴谋团遭到罢黜的前任裁决官，以及竞技场光荣的冠军：血腥叛党！”
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for more refined entertainment, watch the ousted Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"

traits.locale_text: “如果各位打算欣赏更加精致的娱乐活动，就来好好欣赏这场美妙的决斗吧！决斗双方是狂风阴谋团遭到罢黜的前任裁决官，以及竞技场光荣的冠军：血腥叛党！”

languages.text: 「もっと上等な娯楽を求めてるなら、陰謀団〈略奪の嵐〉を追放されたドラコンが、このアリーナの栄えある王者、『血まみれの改宗者たち』と命をかけて戦う試合を観てみろよ！」
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for more refined entertainment, watch the ousted Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"

traits.locale_text: 「もっと上等な娯楽を求めてるなら、陰謀団〈略奪の嵐〉を追放されたドラコンが、このアリーナの栄えある王者、『血まみれの改宗者たち』と命をかけて戦う試合を観てみろよ！」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr auf der Suche nach anspruchsvoller Unterhaltung seid, dann erlebt mit, wie der abgesetzte Dracon des plündernden Sturms gegen die ruhmreichen Champions der Arena, die blutigen Bekehrten, um sein Leben kämpft!"
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for more refined entertainment, watch the ousted Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr auf der Suche nach anspruchsvoller Unterhaltung seid, dann erlebt mit, wie der gebrochene Dracon des plündernden Sturms gegen die ruhmreichen Champions der Arena, die blutigen Bekehrten, um sein Leben kämpft!"

languages.text: «¡Si buscáis un entretenimiento más refinado, venid a ver al Dracón caído de la Tempestad Asoladora luchando por su vida contra los gloriosos campeones de la arena, los Prosélitos Ensangrentados!».
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for more refined entertainment, watch the ousted Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Si buscáis un entretenimiento más refinado, venid a ver al destituido dracón de la Tempestad Asoladora luchando por su vida contra los gloriosos campeones de la arena, los Prosélitos Ensangrentados!».

languages.text: "Daha incelikli bir eğlence arıyorsanız devrilmiş Müfteris Kasırga Drakonu'nun, arenanın görkemli müdafileri olan Kızıl Zındıklar'a karşı hayatı pahasına savaşmasını izleyin!"
languages.original_text: "If you're looking for more refined entertainment, watch the ousted Dracon of the Reaving Tempest fight for his life against the glorious champions of the arena, the Bloodstained Proselytes!"

traits.locale_text: "Daha incelikli bir eğlence arıyorsanız Müfteris Kasırga'nın devrilmiş Drakon'unun, arenanın görkemli müdafileri Kızıl Zındıklar'a karşı hayatı pahasına savaşmasını izleyin!"
